channel.title: IN Great NEED
channel.description: Im working with a very well know coder here on this site and were trying to bring our dreams to reality but there is a lil bit slowing us down Me and my great friend Demonwars are trying to bring demonwars 2.0 to a online version we have a vps but neither of us are any good at vps at all more java based brains but anyone who could be of any assistance getting the server online will be greatly appreciated and remembered in the time of demonwars Reign so plzzzz help me and my mate out

im now the proud owner of a window vps its in the provision state when its done who wants to help me get my server online

item.title: IN Great NEED
item.dc:creator: @laakerules laakerules
item.description:
@laakerules wrote:

Haha, ya most are cheaper i would have to agree to that, just not the ones i looked at i guess!
I would recommend you get rid of the linux, you will spend weeks on weeks on end trying to just get java on there working. Then you will spend more weeks converting your windows batch files over to work on linux.
So take RiiPiiNFtW and my comments into affect and get off linux.

Read full topic

item.title: IN Great NEED
item.dc:creator: @Coder_Daniel Coder Daniel
item.description:
@Coder_Daniel wrote:

im using the linux because its cheaper then the other as of the compony im using is there anyone who can help me with this im really need to be able to get the serve online it would mean a great deal to me and im only asking for the help because we cant figure it out our selfs riipiinftw

Read full topic

item.title: IN Great NEED
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Uhm no? Linux are always cheaper and are MUCH more stable then windows, although im a windows faggot. ;D

OT: Just ask for your moneyback to buy a windows one. And it sounds like you are considering a vps to be a language of its own? Thas pretty entertaining…[quote=“Coder Daniel, post:1, topic:416604”]we have a vps but neither of us are any good at vps at all more java based brains[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: IN Great NEED
item.dc:creator: @laakerules laakerules
item.description:
@laakerules wrote:

Hey i understand your position i did that for my first server, but then i figured out how stupid and hard linux VPS are to just get started! I would try writing a letter of good value to the vps company and try to get money back and buy a windows vps which are most of the time cheaper! i can helpt with the letter if you need help!

Read full topic
